question.title: Facing issue while Spring Boot tries to connect with Chroma
question.body:
I am using Spring Boot 3.3.5 with below properties:

<java.version>17</java.version>
<spring-ai.version>1.0.0</spring-ai.version>

and in application.properties I have configured below properties:

spring.ai.vectorstore.chroma.initialize-schema=true
spring.ai.vectorstore.chroma.base-url=http://localhost:8000/api/v1
spring.ai.vectorstore.chroma.collection-name=demo

I have also tried below:

spring.ai.vectorstore.chroma.base-url=http://localhost:8000

I am able to see list of collections from browser using below:

localhost:8000/api/v1/collections

and I have installed and running Chroma version 0.4.15. While starting Spring Boot application getting below error in console:

404Â Not Found : "{"detail": "Not found"}"

It seems there is issue when Spring Boot tries to make connection with Chroma DB using REST API.
